item.description:
TabTab 1.3.3 Stability Update:

  • New features:
    • Added advanced regex filters for ignoring specific app and window/tab names
    • TabTab should feel snappier and more responsive in general
  • Language improvements:
    • Added Portuguese and Dutch language support
    • Much better tab identification for non-English language tabs
  • Bug fixes:
    • Fixed critical bug that caused some users to not be able to switch between Chrome tabs
    • Fixed critical bug that caused TabTab to crash on some systems
    • TabTab will now switch you to the newest tab instead of the earliest when you have tabs with the same name
